participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys exploring new art forms and expressing thoughts through various media.
participant_1.background: I own a van so I can take my burritos on the road with me. I am resilient and intelligent, thanks to my mom and my love for reading. I like to listen to Elvis. I love to create art with my hands and mind, whether it's through drawing comic books or solving puzzles. I'm not much of a swimmer, but I love my new sneakers!

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Down-to-earth and family-oriented, finds joy in simple things and values authenticity over appearances.
participant_2.background: I am pleased that my family is close and that I get to spend a lot of time with them. I'd rather wear my overalls and boots. I can beat anyone in chess. I've been enjoying my new hobbies of rock collecting and macaroni art. I don't need to dress up to impress my husband because he loves me for who I am.

content.text: I'm going to try to paint a self portrait today.
I love art, I do a lot of rock collecting and macaroni art.
What's the best thing you've found while rock collecting?
I found a beautiful piece of quartz with amethyst inside it.
That sounds amazing. I love amethyst.
Me too, it's my favorite color.
What do you think of macaroni art?
It's so fun, it's a good way to relax.
I'm going to go get started on my self portrait.
